channel.title: Sky Racing 2 Raceday
channel.desc: Thoroughbreds from Riccarton, Kawasaki, Mombetsu, Assiniboia Downs; Greyhound Racing from Richmond Straight, Casino, Warrnambool, Q Straight, Mount Gambier, Cambridge, Addington; Harness Racing from Cambridge, Northfield Park, Hoosier Park.

channel.name: SKY Racing 2 AU
